item.title: Ruby Some Basic
item.description: json 생성 require 'json' jsonbody = JSON.generate["message"=>"test","user"=>"user1"] rest-client을 이용한 예제 require 'rubygems' require 'rest_client' require 'json' jdata = JSON.generate(["test"]) RestClient.put 'http://localhost:4567/users/123', jdata, {:content_type => :json} Net:HTTP GET/PUT require 'net/http' http = Net::HTTP.new('www.data.com') response = http.request_put('/?access_token=123', jsonbody) url = URI.parse('http://localhost:3000/someservice/') request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url.path) request.body = "<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><somedata><name>Test Name 1</name><description>Some data for Unit testing</description></somedata>" response = Net::HTTP.start(url.host, url.port) {|http| http.request(request)} #Note this test PASSES! assert_equal '201 Created', response.
